schema.description: Request to create or update correlation thresholds for a connector.

auto_confirm_threshold.description: Confidence score above which matches are auto-confirmed (0.0-1.0).

batch_size.description: Number of accounts to process per batch.

include_deactivated.description: Whether to include deactivated identities in matching.

manual_review_threshold.description: Confidence score above which matches go to manual review (0.0-1.0).

tuning_mode.description: Whether tuning mode is enabled (logs decisions without acting).

schema.title: UpsertCorrelationThresholdRequest
